alert.note: Alert for Elkhart; Lagrange; Noble (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 6:59PM EDT until July 05 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Elkhart County in north central Indiana... Northwestern Noble County in northeastern Indiana... Southwestern Lagrange County in northeastern Indiana... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 659 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Millersburg, or 7 miles east of Goshen, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Goshen, Ligonier, Lagrange, Middlebury, Topeka, Millersburg, Honeyville, Eddy, Oliver Lake, Emma and Cosperville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
